[Variable] *default-external-format*

Package

ystok.uri

Initial value

:utf-8.

Description

Contains an external-format designator that is acceptable either by both acl-compat and flexi-streams, or by your Lisp implementation.

The percent-encode and percent-decode functions are optimized for the external format UTF-8.
